eliminated then we have trap nesting method and in trap nesting method uh you can identify uh which bird is a good and which B is but in uh trap nesting method uh you put a nest where the bird goes to R and upon laying it is trapped there and therefore you mark it then you remove it then next time another B is is is U is trapped and marked and uh after several uh occasions you find that there are few Birds which will remain unmarked meaning that those birs which will not have any Mark meaning that they are all poor layers or they don't ex then characteristic of a good layer we have coms and a large warm wax and red number two eyes are bright orange and the bird is very very alert then number three uh vent is oval moist red and active and number four temperament they are alert and active then bigs is pale and six space between the kill and the pelvic G pelvic bone or gido should allow two to three fingers uh then broodiness is rare for those good layers they rarely come brooded then we have the space between the pelvic gido you can see in the diagram there for a good layer there is a wider space and for for n layer there is a smaller space and also you can see the finger one finger uh that is for a n layer n layer then we have three fingers for a good layer then the three fingers are supposed to fit exactly in between that space then we go to the images of coms and wats
